info.institution: Istituto di Scienza e Tecnologie dell’Informazione, National Research Council of Italy
info.summary:
Fosca Giannotti works as a Director of Research in Istituto di Scienza e Tecnologie dell’Informazione, National Research Council of Italy, and his\her h-index is 45, g-index is 98. His\Her interests are :
 data mining; complex network; query language; association rule; social network;
